猜不透.definition: to be unable to guess or make out

猜中.definition: to guess correctly; to figure out the right answer

猜得透.definition: to have sufficient insight to perceive; to suspect that ...

猜忌.definition: to be suspicious and jealous of

猜想.definition: to guess; to conjecture; to suppose; (math.) hypothesis

猜枚.definition: drinking game where one has to guess the number of small objects in the other player's closed hand

猜測.definition: to guess; to conjecture; to surmise

猜疑.definition: to suspect; to have misgivings; suspicious; misgivings

猜謎.definition: to answer a riddle; to guess (i.e. form an opinion without much evidence)

猜謎兒.definition: to answer a riddle; to guess (i.e. form an opinion without much evidence)
